subject: fix: optimize all charts and graphs for mobile viewports
body:
- Chart containers: responsive heights (h-48 md:h-64) for all 10 charts
- Heatmap: smaller cells (20px), reduced grid min-width (280px), compact labels on mobile
- Chart.js: mobile-aware font sizes (9px), increased label skipping, tighter legends
- Doughnut: smaller box widths and padding in legend on mobile
- Cards: tighter padding (16px) and smaller stat numbers on small screens
- Added isMobile() helper in state.js for consistent mobile detection
